attributes.action: block the attempt by banks and building societies to charge customers for current accounts and the use of ATM systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Big banks and building societies (which make huge profits through lending and customer charges) have the free use of most of their customers money held in current accounts - therefore the customers should have free use of the current account.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
